title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.257 - Total length of stay (for all inpatients)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.257 - Total length of stay (for all inpatients)

State Regulations

The sum-of-the-days' stay of any group of inpatients
discharged during a specified period of time. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.257

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
